species.name: jigglypuff
descriptions: By freely changing the wavelength of its voice, Jigglypuff sings a mysterious melody sure to make any listener sleepy.
If it inflates to sing a lullaby, it can perform longer and cause sure drowsiness in its audience.
It captivates foes with its huge, round eyes, then lulls them to sleep by singing a soothing melody.
It hugely inflates its stomach and sings a mysterious melody. If you hear this melody, you’ll become sleepy right away.
It rolls its cute eyes as it sings a soothing lullaby. Its gentle song puts anyone who hears it to sleep.

abilities.name: cute-charm
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: competitive
abilities.effect: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.

abilities.name: friend-guard
abilities.effect: Decreases all direct damage taken by friendly Pokémon to 0.75×.
